## Problem 1
clean the data in pols-month.csv

```{r}
pols_month_df = read.csv("data/pols-month.csv") |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  separate(mon, into = c("year", "month", "day"), sep = '-'
  ) |>
  mutate(
    month =
      case_match(
        month,
        "01" ~ "January",
        "02" ~ "February",
        "03" ~ "March",
        "04" ~ "April",
        "05" ~ "May",
        "06" ~ "June",
        "07" ~ "July",
        "08" ~ "August",
        "09" ~ "September",
        "10" ~ "October",
        "11" ~ "November",
        "12" ~ "December"),
    month = as.factor(month))
```
